result.title: ENTRANCE website
result.description: The ENTRANCE platform will act as the official project website to ensure that interested stakeholders have access to all information about the project The website will serve as the main interface for distributing the projects information and results providing regular updates on project activities and achievements deliverables meeting announcements and events workshops webinars etc as well as a series of information products and packages for a wide range of interested stakeholders eg downloadable project brochures newsletters and other dissemination materials The platforms homepage contains also the access to the user login and registration system for the internal Matchmaking Platform
